text: The Scots Wikipedia () is the Scots-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition was started in June 2005. As of , it has about articles. In August 2020, the wiki received criticism from social media and the news for its bad translation from the English language, and is currently being reviewed by the Wikipedia community. ==References== ==Other websites== *Scots Wikipedia main page Category:Wikipedias Category:Websites established in 2005 Category:Scots language
title: Scots Wikipedia
